subject: Welcome to Memlernado!
htmlContent:
Welcome to Memlernado!

Hi {{firstName}},

Welcome to Memlernado, your homeschool SCRUM platform! We're excited to have you join our community of learners and facilitators.

You can now:

  • Create and manage learning workspaces
  • Plan sprints and organize tasks
  • Track progress with our Kanban board
  • Collaborate with other learners and facilitators

Get started by logging in to your account and creating your first workspace!

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

Happy learning!

The Memlernado Team
